text:
Douglas Robert Nowicki (born 8 May 1945) is an American Benedictine monk and Catholic priest. He is the 11th Archabbot of Saint Vincent Archabbey in Latrobe, Pennsylvania, and the Chancellor of Saint Vincent College and the Chancellor of Saint Vincent Seminary.
Nowicki became solemnly professed on July 11, 1966 and was ordained a priest on May 21, 1972.
